long_description: Loaded with features that enhance comfort and designed for high performance riding, the Giro Sapphire(TM) bike helmet makes the long road ahead seem a little less daunting. In-Mold(TM) technology bonds the helmet's tough outer microshell to the impact-absorbent expanded polystyrene liner, creating a light, cool and strong helmet. Roc-Loc(R) 5 suspension fits like a dream, holding the helmet in place effortlessly; anchors directly into the liner for great durability. Roll Cage(TM) reinforcing combines with molding technology that bonds the outer shell to the liner for a light yet strong helmet. Wind Tunnel(TM) vents channel airflow for maximum cooling in the heat of competition. Includes P.O.V.(TM) (Point of View) visor; it has 15deg: of vertical adjustment and keeps visor from coming loose over rough roads.
